TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit InertiaRotationBehavior extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制惯性运动期间旋转操作的减速度。

span.span: Controls the deceleration of a rotation manipulation during inertia.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类指定延迟时旋转操作的行为方式。The class specifies how a rotation manipulation behaves when it is inertia. 使用中的属性事件来执行以下操作：Use the property in the event to do the following: - 它通过设置开始时指定延时的初始速度属性。Specify the initial velocity of the inertia when it begins by setting the property. - 指定操作的所需的旋转，通过设置惯性结束时属性。Specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends by setting the property. - 通过设置来指定预期的减速度的延时属性。Specify the desired deceleration of the inertia by setting the property. 设置或，但不可同时使用两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 当您设置这些属性之一时，其他属性更改为如果的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件处理程序，并设置预期的减速度转换、 扩展和旋转惯性期间使用。The following example shows the event handler and sets the desired deceleration for translation, expansion, and rotation that is used during inertia. 此示例是在一个更大示例的一部分[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。This example is part of a larger example in [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md). [!code-csharp[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#manipulationinertiastarting)] [!code-vb[BasicManipulation#ManipulationInertiaStarting](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/basicmanipulation/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#manipulationinertiastarting)]

summary.span: 获取或设置旋转减慢的速率（度/平方毫秒）。

span.span: Gets or sets the rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.

value.span: 旋转减慢的速率（度/平方毫秒）。

span.span: The rate the rotation slows in degrees per squared millisecond.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定预期的减速度的延时。Use the property to specify the desired deceleration of the inertia. 设置或，但不可同时使用两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 当您设置这些属性之一时，其他属性更改为如果的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).

span.span: The property is set to infinity.

summary.span: 获取或设置惯性运动结束时的旋转度数。

span.span: Gets or sets the rotation, in degrees, at the end of the inertial movement.

value.span: 惯性运动结束时的旋转度数。

span.span: The rotation, in degrees, at the end of the inertial movement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来指定所需操作旋转惯性结束时。Use the property to specify the desired rotation of the manipulation when inertia ends. 设置或，但不可同时使用两者。Set either the or the , but not both. 当您设置这些属性之一时，其他属性更改为如果的值。When you set one of these properties, the other property is changed to if it has a value. 有关操作的详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For more information about manipulations, see the [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 操作响应的应用程序的示例，请参阅[演练： 创建应用的第一个触摸程序](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md)。For an example of an application that responds to manipulations, see [Walkthrough: Creating Your First Touch Application](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-creating-your-first-touch-application.md).
